MACRO( ADD_SRCDIR dir pattern )
    STRING( TOUPPER ${dir} udir )
    FILE( GLOB_RECURSE ${udir}_SOURCES ${dir}/${pattern} )
    SOURCE_GROUP( ${dir} FILES ${${udir}_SOURCES} )
    LIST(APPEND SOURCES ${${udir}_SOURCES} )
ENDMACRO( ADD_SRCDIR )

ADD_SRCDIR( expat *.c )
ADD_SRCDIR( freetype2 *.c )
ADD_SRCDIR( lua *.c )
ADD_SRCDIR( pcre *.c )
ADD_SRCDIR( png *.c )
ADD_SRCDIR( tinyxml *.cpp )
ADD_SRCDIR( zlib *.c )

ADD_LIBRARY( GNextern ${SOURCES} )
